message: Ok let's see them push an 8 pound watermelon out of their ass to see if they still will stick with that assumption.

Very little data because they havnt had the time to create a plausible story for her actions yet...I rant because I'm so tired of ppl using mental illness as an excuse for everything. I know ppl who suffer from mental illness...these ppl are under the care of doctors and have medications and are looked after and checked on...there are doctors out there that are just so willing to medicate and call ya depressed then to really get to the bottom of a person's problem. Ppl are addicted to prescription meds because of these doctors and these medications can cause mental issues. It's a viscous cycle and our government is not oblivious they are enablers.

I want to ask the news people the same stupid question they ask others concerning a shooter; """"Didn't you see the red flags???"""" Other people have stated that he had anger issues. I'll answer their stupid question. You don't see any red flags because these people just get angry and go bezerk. You can't control a deceptive nut but you can limit guns. We need laws that restrict who gets to own a gun and how many is a """"need"""" to own.

I'm sick and tired of those who say Hillary has no great accomplishments. I would say staying out of prison for the crimes she committed in the last four decades is an accomplshment.

All of the people commenting against immigrants, including Sally, are Trump supporters. In fact, Sally belongs to a radical Trump message board called The Common Thread - We Are Trump United. Some of the posts from members contain material that claims Muslims wipe themselves with their hands after using the restroom, posts comparing progressive protesters to the KKK, and posts saying that Trump was placed in office by Jesus. She also follows Breitbart news and Ivanka Trump. That being said, basing your opinion simply on your own experience without empathy for others is morally reprehensible. Also, the immigration ban DID affect people who came here legally - students who were here on student visas, immigrants living here in highly skilled professions, refuges... You best be reading up on the details.
